timeline.bodyText: only clean in memory, how about root.data?

replies.bodyText: Local test case fails because local root.data is reused.

replies.bodyText: fix by deleting the file each time.

replies.bodyText: The branchRegister is on the business side and the globalSession is on the TC side.
